UML:TaggedValue.value: It might be a good idea to move eZINIManager to a separate package which uses the eZCache package.
The default must never be cached to keep them from getting out of sync.
Initialises the exception with a given code. The actual message is automatically created from the code.
Array of default values which overload the settings loaded from INI file.
(Poor mans overloading) If the parameter is an array the file loading is skipped and the array is as group and settings values.
The INI file could not be found on the filesystem.
The INI file could not be read from the filesystem.
The INI file could not be written to the filesystem.
Open question: How to deal with validation of settings, should it be done on parser with a schema or when fetching settings.
